name: Jackpot Buckshot
description:
Made for GMTK Jam 2020. Theme is 'out of control'.

Imagine having a machine that can fill your buckshot bullet with various effects ?

Except that machine is actually a slot machine. You only have little control over what kind of effect your bullet will be, but that's where the fun comes from.

Controls : 

  • WASD - Switch highlighted column and row in the slot machine
  • Mouse - Target enemy
  • LMB - Shoot
  • R - Respin slot machine
  • Esc - Pause

Credits :

All game's content are made by me except for the fonts, which are made by :

codeman38 & Daniel Linssen

The game became out of control at some point during the development. There might be some bugs I didn't know and I believe that some of the bullets are also behaving weirdly. Kindly tell me if you find one.

Any critique and suggestions is very welcome.

Thanks for playing
